cast.overview: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
cast.title: Insomnia

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. Jonathan Stevens Jackson (born May 11, 1982) is an American actor, best known for playing Lucky Spencer, son of supercouple Luke and Laura on the American daytime drama General Hospital. He also played the protagonist, Jesse Tuck, in the 2002 film Tuck Everlasting.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Jonathan Jackson , licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Jonathan Jackson
